plan.text: Set up a Twitter account if you don't have one
Research current AI trends and developments
Create a content calendar for daily tweets
Write engaging tweets about AI trends
Schedule tweets using a social media management tool
Monitor engagement and adjust strategy as needed

questions.label: Do you have an existing Twitter account?
How would you rate your knowledge of AI?
How many times per day do you want to tweet?

discoveries.title: Twitter is a key platform for sharing AI trends
Consistent daily tweeting is crucial for building an audience

pipelines.title: AI Trend Research Pipeline
steps: Set up RSS feeds or alerts

pipelines.title: Tweet Creation and Scheduling Pipeline
steps: Draft tweet content based on research
Include links or media if applicable
